text: Andrzej Niemczyk (16 January 1944 - 2 June 2016) was a Polish volleyball player and coach. He was the coach of the Poland women's national volleyball team that competed at the 2005 Women's European Volleyball Championship. He was born in Łódź. Niemczyk died in Warsaw, Poland from cancer on 2 June 2016, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1944 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Poland Category:Polish volleyball players Category:Volleyball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Łódź
title: Andrzej Niemczyk
